title: Detection and Forecasting of Extreme event in Stock Price Triggered by Fundamental, Technical, and External Factors. (arXiv:2206.13860v2 [q-fin.ST] UPDATED)
abstract: The sporadic large fluctuations are seen in the stock market due to changes in fundamental parameters, technical setups, and external factors. These large fluctuations are termed as Extreme Events (EE). The EEs may be positive or negative depending on the impact of these factors. During such events, the stock price time series is found to be nonstationary. Hence, the Hilbert-Huang transformation (HHT) is used to identify EEs based on their high instantaneous energy ($IE$) concentration. The analysis shows that the $IE$ concentration in the stock price is very high during both positive and negative EE with $IE>E_{\mu}+4\sigma,$ where $E_{\mu}$ and $\sigma$ are the mean energy and standard deviation of energy, respectively. Further, support vector regression is used to predict the stock price during an EE, with the close price being the most helpful input than the open-high-low-close (OHLC) inputs. The maximum prediction accuracy for one step using close price and OHLC prices are 95.98\%

translated_title: 基本面、技术面和外部因素引发股价极端事件的检测和预测
translated_abstract: 股市中出现的不定期大幅波动是由基本参数、技术设置和外部因素的变化引起的。这些大幅波动被称为极端事件 (EE)。EE可以是积极的或消极的，具体取决于这些因素的影响。在此类事件中，股票价格时间序列被发现是非平稳的。因此，使用希尔伯特-黄变换 (HHT) 基于其高瞬时能量 ($IE$) 浓度来识别EE。分析表明，股价中的 $IE$ 浓度在积极和消极的EE中均非常高，其中 $IE>E_{\mu}+4\sigma$，其中 $E_{\mu}$ 和 $\sigma$ 分别是能量的平均值和标准差。此外，采用支持向量回归预测EE期间的股票价格，其中收盘价格比开盘-最高-最低-收盘 (OHLC) 输入更有帮助。使用收盘价和OHLC价格进行一步最大预测精度为95.98\%。
tldr: 该研究使用HHT识别基本面、技术面及外部因素引发的股价极端事件，并使用支持向量回归预测EE期间的收盘价，具有高精度预测的优点。
en_tdlr: This study identifies extreme events (EE) in stock prices triggered by fundamental, technical, and external factors using Hilbert-Huang transformation, and predicts the close price during an EE using support vector regression with high accuracy.
